name: cell machine speed-rebuild
description:
a remake of cell machine build with scratch 3.

dm gusza.1108#9180 in discord for cmsrd se (because the download list is getting way to much)

latest update list:

-bug fixes

-new feature

how to play:

left arrow key to select previous cell/tool

right arrow key to select next cell/tool

space to place cell

select delete tool and click on cell to delete them

cell list(for shortcut):

1.mover

2.left rotator

3.right rotator

there is 2 edition:

ze is zipped edition, for if you dont have scratch 3

se is sb3 edition, for if you want to save up your space
